name: GET_DebitMemoItem
description:
**Note:** This operation is only available if you have [Invoice Settlement](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/Billing/Billing_and_Payments/Invoice_Settlement) enabled. The Invoice Settlement feature is generally available as of Zuora Billing Release 296 (March 2021). This feature includes Unapplied Payments, Credit and Debit Memo, and Invoice Item Settlement. If you want to enable Invoice Settlement, see [Invoice Settlement Enablement and Checklist Guide](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/Billing/Billing_and_Payments/Invoice_Settlement/Invoice_Settlement_Migration_Checklist_and_Guide) for more information.

Retrieves information about a specific item of a debit memo. A debit memo item is a single line item in a debit memo.

Zuora-Track-Id.description:
A custom identifier for tracing the API call. If you set a value for this header, Zuora returns the same value in the response headers. This header enables you to associate your system process identifiers with Zuora API calls, to assist with troubleshooting in the event of an issue.

The value of this field must use the US-ASCII character set and must not include any of the following characters: colon (`:`), semicolon (`;`), double quote (`"`), and quote (`'`).

Zuora-Entity-Ids.description: An entity ID. If you have [Zuora Multi-entity](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/BB_Introducing_Z_Business/Multi-entity) enabled and the OAuth token is valid for more than one entity, you must use this header to specify which entity to perform the operation in. If the OAuth token is only valid for a single entity, or you do not have Zuora Multi-entity enabled, you do not need to set this header.

dmitemid.description: The unique ID of a debit memo item. You can get the debit memo item ID from the response of [List debit memo items](https://www.zuora.com/developer/api-reference/#operation/GET_DebitMemoItems).

debitMemoId.description: The unique ID of a debit memo. For example, 8a8082e65b27f6c3015ba419f3c2644e.

zuora-version.description:
The minor version of the Zuora REST API. See [Minor Version](https://www.zuora.com/developer/api-reference/#section/API-Versions/Minor-Version) for information about REST API version control. 

This header affects the availability of the following response fields:
* `taxItems`
* `taxationItems`
* `comment`
* `description`

$block: Container for custom fields of a Debit Memo Item object.

$ul: **amount**: The amount of the debit memo item. For tax-inclusive debit memo items, the amount indicates the debit memo item amount including tax. For tax-exclusive debit memo items, the amount indicates the debit memo item amount excluding tax.
**amountWithoutTax**: The debit memo item amount excluding tax.
**balance**: The balance of the debit memo item.
**beAppliedAmount**: The applied amount of the debit memo item.
**comment**: Comments about the debit memo item.
**createdById**: The ID of the Zuora user who created the debit memo item.
**createdDate**: The date and time when the debit memo item was created, in `yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss` format. For example, 2017-03-01 15:31:10.
**description**: Description about the debit memo item.
**financeInformation**: Container for the finance information related to the debit memo item.
**deferredRevenueAccountingCode**: The accounting code for the deferred revenue, such as Monthly Recurring Liability.
**deferredRevenueAccountingCodeType**: The type of the deferred revenue accounting code, such as Deferred Revenue.
**recognizedRevenueAccountingCode**: The accounting code for the recognized revenue, such as Monthly Recurring Charges or Overage Charges.
**recognizedRevenueAccountingCodeType**: The type of the recognized revenue accounting code, such as Sales Revenue or Sales Discount.
**revenueRecognitionRuleName**: The name of the revenue recognition rule governing the revenue schedule.
**revenueScheduleNumber**: The revenue schedule number. The revenue schedule number is always prefixed with "RS", for example, RS-00000001.
**id**: The ID of the debit memo item.
**quantity**: The number of units for the debit memo item.
**serviceEndDate**: The end date of the service period associated with this debit memo item. Service ends one second before the date specified in this field.
**serviceStartDate**: The start date of the service period associated with this debit memo item. If the associated charge is a one-time fee, this date is the date of that charge.
**sku**: The SKU for the product associated with the debit memo item.
**skuName**: The name of the SKU.
**sourceItemId**: The ID of the source item.
**sourceItemType**: The type of the source item.
**subscriptionId**: The ID of the subscription associated with the debit memo item.
**success**: Returns `true` if the request was processed successfully.
**taxItems**: Container for the taxation items of the debit memo item..
**taxMode**: The tax mode of the debit memo item, indicating whether the amount of the debit memo item includes tax.
**taxationItems**: Container for the taxation items of the debit memo item.
**data**: List of taxation items.
**nextPage**: URL to retrieve the next page of the response if it exists; otherwise absent.
**unitOfMeasure**: The units to measure usage.
**unitPrice**: The per-unit price of the debit memo item.
**updatedById**: The ID of the Zuora user who last updated the debit memo item.
**updatedDate**: The date and time when the debit memo item was last updated, in `yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss` format. For example, 2017-03-02 15:36:10.
